content: Website | Docs| Instagram| Twitter| Discord| Telegram| NewsletterWe are WallchainA team of veteran FAANG engineers.We are tired of centralized, conventional, gigantic corporations.We put ourselves on a mission to build a healthy decentralized wealth-being for Web3 Community.Various MEV bots are attacking the chain creating huge network congestion.This has a direct impact on the gas price.By breaking free the network from MEV bots we will reduce the gas price and provide a positive climate change.THIS TOPIC IS CREATED PRIOR TO HUGE EVENTS AND MILESTONES WE PLANNED.BECOME ONE OF THE FIRST HONORABLE MEMBERS. TAKE PART IN CONTESTS/COMMUNITY INITIATIVES AND MORE.JOIN OUR CHATS AND FOLLOW WALLCHAIN ON SOCIAL MEDIA.STAY TUNED. EXCITING THINGS AHEAD!10-40% Revenue GrowthDEX treasury gets an immediate revenue boostCashbackUsers get instant cashback in the same transactionSafetyProtect your users from predatory MEV bots that exhaust public mempoolUser-FriendlyWe provide the most friendly way to capture the profits DeFi platforms create for the market.The profits are instantly shared between users and DEX owners.
